title: Home
text:
Hello,
I am Kyle Biagan, a recent UCLA graduate with a B.S. in Statistics and Data Science, strongly proficient in C++, Java, Python, R, SQL, and Tableau. Experienced in data analysis, visualization, and project collaboration during an internship at Boeing, where I optimized cost estimation methodologies and enhanced decision-making processes. Eager to leverage my skills in a company focused on data-driven projects.
This website showcases all of my relevant academic and professional experience.
Please explore my hyperlinks and other pages to find out a bit more about me. Thank you!

Contact Information
Email: kjbiagan23@gmail.com
Phone Number: +1 (949) 689-8270

title: EXPERIENCE AND PROJECTS
text:
Tukwila, WA (Remote from Irvine, CA) June 2022 - August 2022
During Boeing’s ten-week Summer 2022 Business Internship Program (BBIP) - Finance, interacted directly with company leaders to discuss finance, strategy, and the future of Boeing. Working with the Boeing Defense, Space & Security (BDS) P-8A Estimating and Pricing team provided an opportunity to apply education to meaningful projects while developing skills in financial acumen, data analytics, financial modeling, emotional intelligence, and problem-solving. Conducted data analysis of proposal requirements and developed actionable plans for compliant cost proposals, ensuring adherence to Federal Acquisition Regulations (FAR). Additionally, coordinated with cross-functional teams, including Estimating, Pricing, Procurement, Contracts, and Supply Chain, to optimize cost estimation methodologies and enhance proposal development workflows. The role also involved facilitating fact-finding and strategic negotiations, providing data transformation support that improved the accuracy of cost estimates and enhanced decision-making processes.






Santa Barbara, CA (Hybrid) October 2021 - June 2022
Assisted the Marketing and Public Relations Coordinator in supervising community outreach programs, developing and implementing marketing plans to increase support and attendance for UCSB Men’s Soccer games. Collaborated with the Associate Head Coach to design and photograph new material for the team’s official recruiting website. Coordinated community outreach initiatives and crafted strategic marketing plans aimed at enhancing attendance and support for home games. Additionally, captured high-quality photographs of UCSB Men’s Soccer facilities, home games, and team-exclusive events, which improved marketing materials. This work ultimately elevated the digital presence of the UCSB Men’s Soccer program.

title: EXPERIENCE AND PROJECTS
text:
UCSB Men’s Soccer

Gaucho Recruiting Zone Website
Santa Barbara, CA (Hybrid) October 2021 - June 2022
Partnered with Greg Wilson, Associate Head Coach of the UCSB Men’s Soccer team, to design and photograph new content for the rebranded official recruiting website, now named “Gaucho Recruiting Zone.” This project aimed to enhance the site’s appeal and accessibility for prospective student-athletes. The collaboration resulted in a more engaging platform that effectively showcases the program and its opportunities.
